comment:
Online Drammers Club Pour. The best of the 3 Glen Scotia 25 Year Olds I tried. Perfect sherry bomb maritime flavor balance with a little of that Springbank/Kilkerran campbeltown funk. 

Nose: Sultanas, Gas, Raisins, Figs, Apricot, Salted Toffee, Nutmeg, Cinnamon, Citrus, Hazlenuts, Walnuts, Dates, Prunes, Cherries, Burnt Pineapples, Mangoes, Apple Pie, Raspberries, Blueberries, Lime, Celery, Cream Soda

Palate: Apple Pie, Sultanas, Raisins, Cinnamon, Figs, Dates, Cherries, Apricots, Baking Spices, Dark Chocolate, Salted Toffee

Finish: Dark Chocolate, Raisins, Sultanas, Peaches, Pepper, Apples, Cinnamon, Strawberries, Figs, Orange Peels
